alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Upper Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:41PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Grant County through 315 PM MDT... At 241 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Silver City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Walnut Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Upper Gila River Valley
